summary: Email chain between an FBI Special Agent in New York and an Amazon Law Enforcement Response Specialist regarding the status of a criminal subpoena (CRIM1048721 2020 DS) for information related to Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson. The FBI is seeking additional identifiers including phone numbers, email addresses, and Amazon transaction details.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the criminal subpoena CRIM1048721 2020, with the FBI seeking additional identifiers including phone numbers, email addresses, and Amazon transaction details.

persons.name: Ghislaine Borgerson
persons.context: Named alongside Ghislaine Maxwell as a subject of the criminal subpoena CRIM1048721 2020, with the FBI seeking additional identifiers.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York
persons.context: The FBI agent from New York corresponding with Amazon to follow up on the status of subpoena CRIM1048721 2020 and providing additional identifiers for the subjects.

persons.name: Law Enforcement Response Specialist Amazon.com, Inc.
persons.context: The Amazon employee responding to the FBI's inquiry about the status of subpoena CRIM1048721 2020, indicating they are working on it and will follow up.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects of the same criminal subpoena (CRIM1048721 2020) for which the FBI is seeking identifiers from Amazon.
The FBI agent is actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell, as evidenced by the subpoena for her identifiers from Amazon.
The FBI agent is actively investigating Ghislaine Borgerson, as evidenced by the subpoena for her identifiers from Amazon.

connections.person2: Law Enforcement Response Specialist Amazon.com, Inc.
connections.description: Corresponding regarding the status and details of a criminal subpoena for information from Amazon.

events.title: FBI provides additional identifiers for subpoena
events.description: The FBI Special Agent sends an email to Amazon providing additional identifiers (phones, email, Amazon transactions) for Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson related to subpoena CRIM1048721 2020.

events.title: Status inquiry for Amazon subpoena
events.description: Email chain on January 28, 2020, where the FBI Special Agent follows up on the status of criminal subpoena CRIM1048721 2020, and the Amazon specialist responds that they are working on it.
personsInvolved: Law Enforcement Response Specialist Amazon.com, Inc.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson in January 2020 under case number CRIM1048721 2020.
The investigation involved subpoenaing Amazon for identifiers including phone numbers, email addresses, and transaction details linked to the subjects.
The FBI had partial credit card information (first four and last four digits) for transactions and was seeking the full numbers from Amazon.
The correspondence shows ongoing law enforcement efforts to gather digital evidence from technology companies related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.
